articles.description: According to legal documents, 20-year-old Homer Heche Laffoon made the request in Los Angeles County Court this week to take control of his mother's fortune.
articles.content:
Anne Heche's eldest son has applied to be in charge of the late star's estate after she died without a will, from injuries sustained in a fireball car crash last month.
According to legal documents,… [+6303 chars]

articles.author: Anya Ryan
articles.title: Fringe audiences are 99% white? As a South Asian critic, I found Edinburgh’s screaming lack of diversity hugely troubling - The Guardian
articles.description: Outdated terminology, racist gags, almost entirely white audiences … with just a few fantastic exceptions, fringe shows do not feel like they are for people like me
articles.content: Im sitting in the audience of another Edinburgh fringe show. The month is in full swing and, as a reviewer, Ive fallen into the pattern of rushing across the city from one venue to another to find my… [+4729 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Taylor
articles.title: Elegance expert reveals the 10 things you should NEVER do if you want to appear classy - Daily Mail
articles.description: Elegance and etiquette expert Anna Bey, who splits her time between London and Geneva, gave advice on the top mistakes people make which make them appear less elegant in a YouTube video.
articles.content:
An elegance expert has revealed the top 10 things to avoid if you want to be considered 'elegant' and 'classy'.
